gmx:name.gco:CharacterString: Feature catalog for Rail Transit Stations: United States and Territories, 2013

gmx:scope.gco:CharacterString: Passenger trains; Railroad stations; Local transit; Passenger trains; Monorails; Cable cars (Streetcars)

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Name of the route(s) served by station (Route names delineated by commas e.g. Blue, Red Lines) in alphabetical order
5 digit U.S. Postal Code of Station
Used to identify nodes that are not Stations such as rail junctions and State Borders
Office of the Assistant Secretary for Research and Technology's Bureau of Transportation Statistics (OST-R/BTS)
TIGER 2000 U.S. Bureau of the Census (BOC)
